virtualenvwrapper.project 1.2¶

virtualenvwrapper.project is a plugin for virtualenvwrapper to extend its project-management features. Where virtualenvwrapper is for managing virtualenv environments, project manages your development source directories.

Features¶

  1. Manages your development project work directories along with your virtualenv environments.
  2. Defines an API for creating templates to quickly create new environments consistently.
  3. Use workon command from virtualenvwrapper to switch between projects.
  4. User-configurable hooks for customizing new projects.
